CommitComments.CommitComment: Some small modifications for the next version of KEMS (with a strategy for C1)
Origin refactored. C1 Simple Strategy incorporated into ProverInterface. Still to do: C1Valuation and ProofVerifier
Most important part of C1 Simple Strategy implemented. Next step is to refactor Origin.
Several tests added for the C1 Simple Strategy. Seems to be working.
A generator for the sixth LFI family
First apparently correct version of C1SimpleStrategy (with a lot of other classes used to implement the system) as well as tests
Several new classes and tests for implementing C1. Still incomplete
